"Wine glass time machine": Create a wine glass that with a special design that allows you to travel back in time. Every time you take a sip, the wine glass transports you to a different era, complete with the sights, sounds, and smells of that time period.

"Smart wine glass": Develop a wine glass thatvid with a special sensor that tracks the of of the wine. Every time you take a sip, the wine glass displays the information on its LED screen, allowing you to learn more about the wine you're drinking.

"Wine glass with built-in speaker": Create a wine glass with a built-in speaker that plays music while you drink. The music can be customized to fit the taste of the wine you're drinking, and the volume can be adjusted to your liking.

"Wine glass with a built-in LED light": Develop a wine glass with a built-in LED light that changes color as you drink. The color can be customized to fit the taste of the wine you're drinking, and the intensity can be adjusted to your liking.

"Wine glass with a built-in GPS": Create a wine glass with a built-in GPS that tracks your location as you drink. Every time you take a sip, the wine glass displays your current location on its LED screen, allowing you to explore new places while you drink.
